text: Hi Alexander - just wanted to check in and see how everything is going.  As well as recommending that you check out <https://www.sidefx.com/forum/>  I also wanted to direct you to <https://forums.odforce.net/>  this forum is often referred to by Artists in our team and I think it is a great source of info and support.  Anyway hope all is going well and looking forward to any updates.
